name: Space Man (ArrieBoy22)
description:
Explore a scary house...

Find keys and escape him...

Most import, get to the attic...

What is the secret?

Lore:

You and your friends love talking about haunted houses and creepy stuff like that. They all binge watch ghost hunting series and paranormal activity documentaries. You and your friends have never actually been inside a haunted house though. One day an unfortunate accident happens in a mansion right on the corner of their block. A man, an astronaut was found dead inside his mansion and the only thing left that remains is keys and his suit. Some say his suit got possessed, and that all his secrets are in the attic. You are always the one in the friend group that is chosen to do stupid things, so they all triple dog dare you to try to get to the attic. What happens next?
